Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes

  • Deprecated Enum Constants
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    com.clover.sdk.v3.order.IOrderService
    Please use the IOrderServiceV3_1 via OrderConnector instead, it offers all the same functionality but is designed to handle large orders (over 1MB) that cause this API to fail. New methods may not be added to this class going forward.
    com.clover.sdk.ValueExtractorEnum
    Replaced by ExtractionStrategy.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.clover.sdk.v1.printer.job.ImagePrintJob
    Use ImagePrintJob2. This class writes files into external storage that are not cleaned up and can eventually exhaust the device's storage.
    com.clover.sdk.v3.order.OrderV3Connector
    Please use the OrderConnector instead, it offers all the same functionality but is designed to handle large orders (over 1MB) that cause this API to fail. New methods may not be added to this class going forward.
    com.clover.sdk.v1.printer.PrinterConnector.PrinterCallback
  • Deprecated Enums 
    Enum and Description

    com.clover.sdk.util.Platform.Feature

    com.clover.sdk.util.Platform.SecureProcessorPlatform
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.clover.sdk.v1.Intents.ACTION_BILL_SPLIT 
    com.clover.sdk.v1.Intents.ACTION_GIFT_CARD_TX 
    com.clover.sdk.v1.tender.TenderIntent.ACTION_MERCHANT_CHANGED 
    com.clover.sdk.v1.Intents.ACTION_PAY
    Replaced by Intents.ACTION_MERCHANT_TENDER and Intents.ACTION_CUSTOMER_TENDER
    com.clover.sdk.v1.Intents.ACTION_REQUEST_ROLE
    Use Intents.ACTION_AUTHENTICATE_EMPLOYEE with Intents.EXTRA_ACCOUNT_ROLES.
    com.clover.sdk.v1.Intents.ACTION_SCAN
    This does not work on recent devices. Use BarcodeScanner instead.

    Broadcast to start barcode scanner service on Station or Mini (Mobile scanner must be activated via physical trigger)

    Extras passed:

    • Intents.EXTRA_START_SCAN - true will start scanner, false will close scanner (Required)
    • Intents.EXTRA_SHOW_PREVIEW - whether scanner preview video will be shown, default is true
    • Intents.EXTRA_SHOW_MERCHANT_PREVIEW - whether scanner preview will be shown in merchant facing mode, default is true
    • Intents.EXTRA_SHOW_CUSTOMER_PREVIEW - whether scanner preview will be shown in customer facing mode, default is true
    • Intents.EXTRA_LED_ON - whether LED will be on (Station only), default is false
    • Intents.EXTRA_SCAN_QR_CODE - whether QR codes will be scanned, default is true
    • Intents.EXTRA_SCAN_1D_CODE - whether 1D codes will be scanned, default is true
    • Intents.EXTRA_SHOW_CLOSE_BUTTON - whether scanner preview will have a 'close' button, default is true
    • Intents.EXTRA_SHOW_LED_BUTTON - whether scanner preview will have an LED toggle, default is true
    com.clover.sdk.v1.Intents.ACTION_STORE_CREDIT 
    com.clover.sdk.v3.inventory.InventoryContract.ItemColumns.COUNT
    Use InventoryContract.ItemStockColumns.QUANTITY instead. Count of items in stock.

    Type: INTEGER
    com.clover.sdk.v1.Intents.EXTRA_APP 
    com.clover.sdk.v1.Intents.EXTRA_AVAILABLE 
    com.clover.sdk.v1.Intents.EXTRA_DIALOG 
    com.clover.sdk.v1.Intents.EXTRA_IS_TESTING 
    com.clover.sdk.v1.Intents.EXTRA_TRANSACTION_NO
    , internally in the SPS/SPA

  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.clover.sdk.v3.order.IOrderService.addPayment(String, Payment, List<LineItem>, ResultStatus)
    Use IOrderService.addPayment2(java.lang.String, com.clover.sdk.v3.payments.Payment, java.util.List<com.clover.sdk.v3.order.LineItem>, com.clover.sdk.v1.ResultStatus). If necessary, use other methods to open the cash drawer and log cash events.
    com.clover.sdk.util.CloverAuth.authenticate(Activity, Account)
    Use CloverAuth.authenticate(Context, boolean, Long, TimeUnit) on SDK levels 26 or higher.
    com.clover.sdk.util.CloverAuth.authenticate(Activity, Account, boolean)
    Use CloverAuth.authenticate(Context, boolean, Long, TimeUnit) on SDK levels 26 or higher.
    com.clover.sdk.util.CloverAuth.authenticate(Activity, Account, boolean, Long, TimeUnit)
    Use CloverAuth.authenticate(Context, boolean, Long, TimeUnit) on SDK levels 26 or higher.

    Use CloverAuth.authenticate(Context, boolean, Long, TimeUnit) on SDK levels 26 or higher.
    com.clover.sdk.util.CloverAuth.authenticate(Context, Account, boolean)
    Use CloverAuth.authenticate(Context, boolean, Long, TimeUnit) on SDK levels 26 or higher.
    com.clover.sdk.util.CloverAuth.authenticate(Context, Account, boolean, Long, TimeUnit)
    Use CloverAuth.authenticate(Context, boolean, Long, TimeUnit) on SDK levels 26 or higher.

    com.clover.sdk.util.Platform.get()
    com.clover.sdk.util.CloverAccount.getAccounts(Context)
    Use CloverAccount.getAccount(Context) instead. Very early versions of Clover software supported multiple Clover Accounts on a single device, but this is no longer the case, there is now always a single Clover Account on each device.

    com.clover.sdk.v3.inventory.InventoryConnector.getItemIds(ServiceConnector.Callback<List<String>>) 
    com.clover.sdk.v3.inventory.InventoryConnector.getItems() 
    com.clover.sdk.v3.inventory.IInventoryService.getItems(ResultStatus)
    Many merchants have a large inventory of items that cannot be retrieved in a single shot due to binder and memory limits. As a precaution always use the InventoryContract to retrieve the entire set of inventory items.

    This method will return a maximum of 500 items before returning a fault.
    com.clover.sdk.v3.inventory.InventoryConnector.getItems(ServiceConnector.Callback<List<Item>>) 
    com.clover.sdk.v3.inventory.InventoryConnector.getItemsWithCategories()
